author: {'steamid': '76561197973236751', 'num_games_owned': 755, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 2103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 904, 'last_played': 1433626453}
review:
King's Bounty Crosswords is an overlooked rpg/strategy hybrid wich stayed under my radar when it was published in 2010. 
Crossworlds contains also the "The armored Princess" campaign. If you want to play "The Armored Princess" buy this game!

I would suggest to start with the "Orcs on the March" campaign - the director's cut of "The Armored Princess".

author: {'steamid': '76561197967668280', 'num_games_owned': 608, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1616383037}
review:
FIRST: Everyone is correct, purchase 'King's Bounty: Crossworlds" as it includes the base game and both expansions for $5 more than the standard edition but $5 less than the platinum edition.

SECOND: Actually really enjoy this game so far, especially considering I'm just now diving into strategy games. The mechanics take a little bit to figure out but after about an hour you should have a pretty firm grasp of what does what. The graphics are pretty darn good if a little cartoony but that doesn't bother me any. I really like the mix of strategy/fantasy rpg. It's actually a lot of fun, sorta like playing fantasy chess if you will. There doesn't seem to be much of any voice acting, again not a problem for me but just be prepared to do a lot of reading to get the back story and follow what is going on.

Would definitely recommend a buy if you like these kind of games. I'm terrible at and have always hated strategy games but this one is pretty darn fun. Also my first time reviewing a game on steam so, that should tell you something.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038538764', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 23874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22782, 'last_played': 1431842330}
review:
Umfangreich und für jeden empfehlenswert, der Spiele wie Heroes of Might and Magic mag!

Heroes selbst ging damals aus der Kings Bounty Serie hervor. Beide spielen sich deshalb ähnlich, aber nicht gleich. Dies ist eigentlich das Zusatzpack zum 2. Teil der Serie ("Armored Princess"). Da "Crossworlds" (eigentlich Zusatzpack) aber den kompletten 2. Teil  umfasst, sowie neue Einheiten und Sprüche sollte man diesen Teil kaufen und nicht "Armored Princess". Dieser Teil ist auch komplett bugfrei und jede Erklärung und Beschreibung passt, enthält inzwischen also keinerlei Fehler.

Es spielt sich im Prinzip wie der 1, Teil der Serie. Allerdings ist es noch umfangreicher, hat viele neue Einheiten und Zaubersprüche. Theoretisch ist es auch nicht so linear wie der 1. Teil, da man zwischen verschiedenen Inseln und ihren Völkern hin und her springen kann. Zum Freischalten der Inseln muss man jeweils etwas schwerere Kämpfe bestehen.

Die Wutgeister aus dem 1. Teil gibt es jetzt als normale Zaubersprüche. Dafür hat man jetzt einen kleinen Drachen dabei, der andere, aber durchaus nützliche Fertigkeiten mitbringt. Auch ist das Spiel sehr auf Zufall ausgelegt. Dies wirkt sich auf die kaufbaren Einheiten und Gegenstände/Zauber zum Sammeln aus. Leider ist das nicht immer positiv. In einem Durchgang verfollständigt man ein Gegenstandsset/findet alle wichtigen Zaubersprüche, im anderen nicht. In einem Durchgang findet man vielleicht genügend Monster für seinen Spilstil, im anderen nicht. Eigentlich sollte dies zum mehrmaligen Durchspielen motivieren, ich sehe aber hierin einen grundlegenden Fehler des Spiels. Wenn man nämlich in der Hauptstory voran schreitet, bekommt man immer mehr Menscheneinheiten zum kaufen. Andere Völker jedoch nicht. Will ich aber mit Orks spielen, bin ich nur auf die vorhandenen angewiesen. Hier sollten eigentlich auch mit Fortschritt in der Hauptstory mehr Einheiten anderer Völker freigeschaltet werden...

Als neue Völker gegenüber dem 1. Teil gibt es nun ein Reptilienvolk, welches rundum gelungen ist und interessante neue und abwechslungsreiche Kreaturen bietet. Diese machen sowohl als Gegner, als auch als eigene Einheiten viel Spass. Zudem gibt es das neue Volk der Orks mit ihrer Adrenalin Fähigkeit. Die besagt, das mit mehr Tötungen durch die Orks deren Adrenalin anwächst und so auch deren Spezialfähigkeiten ermöglicht. Allerdings nerven Orks als Gegner nur und sind meiner Meinung nach over-powered. Wenn ich eine Gruppe habe, die alle Gegner umhaut habe ich bei den Orks fast immer unvermeidbare Verluste. Nicht schön...

Negativ anzumerken ist auch, dass der Anfang auf den ersten 3 Inseln zu zäh ist. Man bekommt zuwenig "Kanonenfutter", um seinen Held zu leveln. Deswegen sind alle Kämpfe am Anfang nen Tacken zu schwer. Ausserdem sind 2 Gegner Im Spiel völlig zu schwer geraten-bei denen passt das Balancing hinten und vorne nicht. Im Anschluss an mein Review hab ich mit einigem Abstand (wegen Spoiler Gefahr) deren Namen mit einigen Tips zum Besiegen mal aufgeschrieben.

Richtig vermisst habe ich auch den Humor des 1. Teils. Wo man da oft ins Schmunzeln kam und der Held alles mit einem Augenzwinkern sah, ist die Heldin hier langweilig.

Jedoch überwiegen insgesamt gesehen die positiven Aspekte weit die negativen. Liebhaber von Heroes und dem 1. Teil der Serie sollten definitiv zuschlagen! Klare Kaufempfehlung!

















P.S.: Die völlig zu schwer geratenen Gegner sind zum einen 
- der König der Echsen (Khatu). Hier sollte man mit Paladinen oder Dunklen Rittern antreten. Diese können ihn fast allein fertig machen. Andere Einheiten haben aber massive Probleme bei ihm. Seine Angriffe (auch der Flächenschaden) sind körperliche Angriffe, wogegen Paladine und Dunkle Ritter gut gewappnet sind.
- Der zweite schlecht balancierte Gegner ist Scrounger. Eine Orkheldin, aus dem Zusatzpack mit massigst Orks. Da dieses Volk eh zu stark geraten ist, ist dieser Kampf viel zu schwer. Hier hilft fast nur der Zauberspruch "Magische Fesseln" auf Stufe 3, der alle Spezialfähigkeiten des Gegners blockiert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076002350', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 6057, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6057, 'last_played': 1507829965}
review:
2020/8/3　Ⅱの公開記念にやり直して気持ちあらたに再レビュー

自分はRPGと名のつくものはRPを重視するのは当然と考えている
それが多様な育成、スタンス・自己投影する余地が用意されてるゲームなら猶更だ
King's BountyもそういうRP性があるゲームだと認識している

が、それを許してくれるゲームでは無い
例えばアンデッドの軍勢を率いてネクロプレイ的な遊び方をしようとする
装備も集めてアンデッドに有利な効果も付けて部隊も増やした
ところがある日を境にそれを中止させられる事になる

このゲームはユニットの在庫に限りがあって無くなると雇用は出来なくなる
つまり場合によってはRPの変更を半ば強制的に強いられてしまうのだ、非常にモチベが下がる

「これそういうゲームじゃねぇから」って言う人も当然いるだろう
でも自分はRPGという名のマネジメントゲームみたいに感じ非常に勿体ないと思う

author: {'steamid': '76561198007300752', 'num_games_owned': 537, 'num_reviews': 237, 'playtime_forever': 5357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5357, 'last_played': 1427345124}
review:
The Kings Bounty series is interesting. It's cute but a failure to innovate the series leaves new players a choice of 4 or 5 ames that are essentially the same. Crossworlds is probably the best of the King's Bounty series. The game is bright, colorful and interesting to explore. Having an interesting game world goes a long way in keeping your interest.

The gameplay is rather simple. Buy your troops (these increase over time) and go fight battles. Again and again and again. It's tough to figure out why I like this game so much because it is so repetitive. But every battle is different, every combination of troops a potential interesting tactical puzzle to solve and there's always something - a quest, an area or just a distant castle - to keep you moving foward. There's always a challenge out there and there's always a new, interesting place to visit and cool, different types of troops to use. There's always a new spell to use or upgrade, and new item to equp or a new skill to choose. The rewards are well paced and keep the player interested in the game.

Now I believe sometimes a game can take too long and this is one. It would have been a better game at 20 hours. After wa while you may very well get bored with the formula. In fact, it could be said that the game may be best played on easy just so you can move through the content as quickly as possible. But it's one of those titles that you can dive back into and pick up at any time. 

The formula works well enough despite the repitive nature of the game. It's cute, it's fun and it's worth the money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145239055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 2143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1573, 'last_played': 1429553299}
review:
Very well made and fun. Similar to Heroes of Might and Magic. Definetly worth the price.

I would recommend playing this instead of 'Kings Bounty the legend' since this one has simingly minor improvements that really help you out throughout the long campaign.

The boss battles are a bit tough though, even on easy difficulty, since it doesn't allow you to use your pet dragon, which I find kind of an odd design choice since boss battles are really where you need extra help...

author: {'steamid': '76561198041269966', 'num_games_owned': 1657, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 2227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1484, 'last_played': 1693142999}
review:
Абсолютно непонятно зачем! В игру по сравнению с "Armored Princess" добавляют только:
2 отдельные коротенькие истории (на час-полтора максимум).
Небольшое расширение для основной игры (1 новый остров с 7 квестами).
Пару новых артефактов, заклинаний и перерисованных юнитов.
И дисбаланснутое расширение для орков с их адренолином!

Скажите: "Что я жалуюсь? Вполне пойдёт для дополнения". 
Да. Для дополнения пойдёт. Но тут с нас требуют полную стоимость игры! Загляните в магазин Steam - стоимость AP и Crossworlds одинакова. И если ты обладаешь одной из игр скидку на другую не дают...
Что я хотел сказать: Игра стоит своих денег, но жадность издателя не знает границ.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113209031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 223, 'playtime_forever': 1217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1217, 'last_played': 1425645997}
review:
[h1]Поздравляю всех Дам с 8 Марта[/h1]

[h1]King's Bounty:[/h1]
[u]Перекрёстки миров[/u] -[b] это мир фэнтезий, где каждый твой сделанный шаг ведет к победе.[/b]

[h1]Об игре[/h1]
В общем напишу сразу, [i]King's Bounty: Перекрёстки миров[/i] это таже [u]King's Bounty: Принцесса в доспехах[/u] тот же [b]сюжет,[/b] при этом включает в себя несколько обновленную версию игры под названием [u]«Поход орков»[/u] и плюс ко всему 2 отдельных DLC: [u]«Чемпион арены»[/u] и [u]«Защитник короны».[/u] Вот Вам и [b]Перекрёстки миров.[/b]

[h1]Что нового?[/h1] в игре [u]«Поход орков»[/u] [strike](Принцесса в доспехах)[/strike][h1][/h1] 
[i]Копирую написанное из самой игры[/i]
➊ 9 существ
➋ 70 предметов и комплектов
➌ более 50 умений для существ
➍ 13 заклинаний
➎ загадочная Башня Чародея
➏ сеть Военных Академий
➐ новые умения героев
➑ новые задания
➒ особенность Адреналина для орков

[h1]Сражения[/h1]
Сражения в игре происходят также на поле в походовом режиме, где бой делится на раунды. На этот раз в бою вместо [u]Духов ярости[/u] приходит на помощь спутник принцессы [u]Дракончик[/u]. У него свои таланты и способности, которые со временем развиваются, получая опыт и также можно использовать магию.

[h1]Сюжет [u]краткое содержание[/u][/h1]
Эндорию захватили демоны во главе с Баалом. Амели зная что Билл Гилберт оправился на поиски мира Теаны, отправляется за ним. Прибыв туда, она узнаёт, что Билла Гилберта здесь не было и чтобы вернуться назад, ей предстоит собрать 8 камней Теаны, чтобы получить возможность узнать у богов, где находится Билл Гилберт и остановить Баалома......

[h1]Музыкальное сопровождение и атмосфера[/h1]
Музыка в игре также прекрасна и как мне показалось, что атмосферка в игре уже более ощутима чем в предыдущей серии, хотя отличия особо не заметил, либо я здесь так погрузился в игру, либо первую часть проходил на [spoiler]отъебись.[/spoiler]

[h1]Схожие игры[/h1]
Игра схожа [u]тематикой сражений[/u] с сериий игр [b]Heroes of Might and Magic[/b]

[h1]Оценки игры[/h1]
➊[i]Сюжет 6/10[/i]
➋[i]Графика 6/10[/i]
➌[i]Музыка 9/10 [/i]
➍[i]Атмосфера 4,5/10[/i]

[b]Общая оценка игры 6/10[/b]


[h1]DLC: [i]«Чемпион арены»[/i][/h1]
Тут предстоит сразится с 8-ми боссами на арене за Пояс чемпиона.

[h1]DLC: [i]«Защитник короны»[/i][/h1]
Это дополнение покажет, что случилось после оригинальной игры [u]King's Bounty: Принцесса в доспехах[/u] 

[b]Общая оценка DLC 5/10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198042373502', 'num_games_owned': 1345, 'num_reviews': 394, 'playtime_forever': 8533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4005, 'last_played': 1564502339}
review:
[b]Никогда не надо слушать, что говорят цветы. Надо просто смотреть на них и дышать их ароматом.[/b]

[i]Билл Гилберт победил врагов, как внешний так и внутренних, сразил жуткого дракона, спас принцессу прекрасную и отправился в другие миры, дабы на людей посмотреть, да себя показать. И, казалось бы, в королевстве Дарион наступил мир и покой, но увы, чувство защищенности оказалось ложным и угроза пришла оттуда, откуда ее совсем не ждали. О нет, тому виной не некроманты, что скрылись в своем затерянном городе, где-то в Моршанских топях. И нет, не появился очередной внучатый племянник Марка Леонара, что вознамерился заполучить трон. Все куда проще и одновременно ужасней – демон Баал, владыка шестого дома Демониса вернулся со Дна Миров, дабы отомстить Биллу Гилберту и всем тем, кто ему дорог. Кто же остановит могущественное порождение преисподние? Глупый вопрос. Вы, разумеется. Вернее не совсем вы, а принцесса Амелия, что взяв в одну руку портрет любимого учителя, а во вторую руку часы стража времени, готовиться к тому, чтобы спасти не один мир, а целых два. Ну а чего вы хотите от дитя богов?[/i]

Изначально, когда «King's Bounty: Crossworlds» только вышел, многие игроки плевались. Дескать эта все тажа «Принцесса в доспехах» с той лишь разницей, что в оригинальную кампанию были внесены косметические изменения, были добавлены пара новых квестов, несколько новых юнитов, да горка новых артефактов. Не так уж много новшеств, особенно в свете того, что расширенная и дополненная игра продавалась по цене оригинального издания. Неприятно. Однако, нашлись добрые люди, среди фанатов, которые подумали-подумали и решили расширить «Перекрестки миров» благодаря входящему в комплект с игрой редактору. Назвали сие чудо «Красными песками» (Ссылку давать не буду, найти эту кампанию в сети труда не составляет) и оно расширило мир игры, добавило новые задания, новых юнитов, новый остров, но что самое главное – наши юниты получили возможность расти в уровнях, а в качестве приятного бонуса выступал призываемый юнит, злобоглаз Асмодео, который при должном уровне сноровке мог в одиночку перебить половину вражеских бойцов. И именно благодаря стараниям фанатов «Перекресток миров» стал не просто бюджетным аддоном, а практически новой игрой, к которой надо еще привыкнуть, что радует… во всяком случае меня.

Но то была речь о нововведениях, а как быть с самой игрой? Ведь для некоторых из присутствующих, «Перекрестки миров» могут оказаться первой игрой из серии «King's Bounty», так чего им ждать от данной игры? Ну для начало это то, что перед нами шахматы. Шахматы, упакованные в яркую и красочную обертку, и где каждый юнит обладает своими уникальными навыками, но тем не менее это шахматы. И как всякие шахматы тут нам предстоит думать на несколько ходов вперед, ведь противостоящие нам армии, как правило, превосходят по численности нашу раза так в три, а коли так, то придется крутится волчком и всячески изгаляться отвлекая врагов призванными существами или беря последних под контроль. Это интересно, это увлекательно, а что самое главное – каждый новый бой не похож на предыдущий и оттого порой приходится скрежетать зубами, когда после сражения с Фхтаганом (Машет рукой Говарду Лавкрафту) от армии твоей остались лишь рожки да ножки. Игра бросает вызов? Да еще какой! Особенно если играешь на последнем уровне сложности. Непередаваемые очучения, да.

В плане же истории перед нами предстает красивая и увлекательная сказка, в которой найдется место как подвигам, так и любви. История о настоящих героях, о мерзких предателях, а также о том, что добро обязательно победит зло. Герои, в том числе и те кого мы встретим всего раз или два за игру получились яркими, запоминающимися и с ними просто интересно поговорить о том, о сём. Также тут имеется миллион и одна отсылка на известные и не очень произведения, начиная от аниме-сериала «Slayers» и заканчивая «Островом сокровищ». 

Итог? Ярко, увлекательно, качественно и реиграбельно. И если смотреть на все это дело объективно, то оригинальная «Принцесса в доспеха» заслуживает девять из десяти умилительных дракончиков, в то время, как «Перекресток миров», в привычном виде, заслуживает лишь пять из десяти злобных демонов, но если мы сюда добавляем «Красные пески», а мы их добавляем, то получаем крепкие:

8 из 10 мертвых ящеров

P.S. А если вы не играли в «Принцессу в доспехах», то оценку можете смело округлить до десятки и не ошибетесь.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083849058', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2685, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1931, 'last_played': 1507653756}
review:
Ich habe dieses Strategie-Spiel nun über 33 Stunden gespielt, bin Level 34 und hab noch nicht mal die Hälfte an Inseln abgearbeitet. Das Spiel fesselt sehr und es fällt mir immer extrem schwer, irgendwo Schluß zu machen. Es werden mit den zu lösenden Haupt- und Nebenquests interessante Geschichten erzählt. Das Spielprinzip macht sehr süchtig. Das Spiel sieht schön aus, die Grafik ist toll und Detailreich. Die Animationen im Kampf sind witzig gemacht und abwechslungsreich. Der Sound passend dazu.  

Mit Prinzessin Amelie hat man eine weibliche Heldin, die man mit Hilfe von drei Skillstrees weiter entwickeln kann. Schlüssel zum Erfolg ist nicht nur die Fähigkeit, die Truppen auch führen zu können (sonst machen sie sich im Kampf selbstständig). Entwickelt man die Fähigkeit (was lange dauert), kann man auch durch Intelligenz die Truppen vom Gegner überreden, überzulaufen. Für Magier empfiehlt sich die volle Durchskillung des Magie/Mana-Baumes. Aber auch Intelligenz ist wichtig. Mana und Wut sind im Kampf wichtig, ohne Wut kann man den Drachen nicht benutzen, ohne Mana kann man nicht zaubern. Darum sollte man möglichst schnell so skillen, dass diese Werte erhöht werden. 

Man bekommt einen kleinen Drachen (Farbe und Anfangsfähigkeiten kann man sich aussuchen), der im Kampf hilft und ein Zauberbuch, dass man schnell mit neuen Sprüchen füllen sollte, die man überall in der Welt finden kann. Schriftrollen kann man ins Buch übertragen, damit man den Spruch dauerhaft behält. Und das sollte man so früh wie möglich nutzen. 

Truppen holt man sich in der Welt in den verschiedenen Gebäuden. Es lohnt sich jeder Besuch und auch, die Fähigkeiten und Werte der Truppen zu vergleichen. Es zählt nicht nur die Stärke, die Anzahl oder dass sie viel Schaden machen, sondern auch, wie groß ihre Widerstandskraft ist und ob sie Spezialfähigkeiten im Kampf einsetzen können. So holen manche noch andere Truppen durch Beschwörung, rufen oder keimen dazu, können Zauber aussprechen oder sich verwandeln (Werwölfe, Vampire). Eine gute Mischung aus starken Fernkämpfern, Magiern und starken Nahkämpfern ist wichtig. Sammelt man fleißig die Eier aus herumliegenden Nestern, kann man diese Kreaturen dann im Kampf einsetzen oder ausbrüten und in die eigene Armee integrieren. Aber vorsicht, man hat nur wenige Plätze und zwei Reserveplätze zur Verfügung. Hier sollte man besonders gute Truppen im Vorrat kaufen, zum Beispiel Drachen, Riesen, Paladine oder Zyklopen, denn es dauert lange, bis man die Führungsfähigkeit für eine stattliche Menge dieser guten Kämpfer zusammen hat. Und so kann man nach jedem Kampf und bei jedem Levelaufstieg ein paar aus der Reserve nehmen.

Ist eines der Gebäude wichtig für einen Quest, wird ein kleines Fähnchen darüber angezeigt. Dann muss man nur noch die richtige Dialogzeile auswählen. Das habe ich leider erst etwas später gemerkt. Will man Schlösser angreifen, kann man mit einem Rechtsklick die Stärke und Zusammensetzung der Truppen sehen und sich überlegen, ob es zu schaffen ist. Dort kann man dann oft besonders tolle Truppen kaufen und auch wertvolle Artefakte und Ausrüstung. 

Die Artefakte und Ausrüstungen sind noch eine Methode, wie man seine Heldin weiter entwickeln kann. Beispielsweise gibt es dreier-Sets, die einen starken Bonus geben, wenn man alle drei Teile ausgerüstet hat (Zum Beispiel Wut oder Vorteile beim führen eines bestimmten Volkes). Es gibt aber auch Artefakte, die man aufwerten kann, in dem man hinein geht, um mit den Wächtern zu kämfen. Diese Kämpfe sind schwerer, als normale Kämpfe. Zudem haben manche Gegenstände eine schlechte oder gute Moral, da sollte man also aufpassen. Auch wenn Truppen zusammen kämpfen, die nicht zusammen passen, kann sich das schlecht auf die Moral auswirken, also beispielweise wenn Paladine mit dunklen Rittern kämpfen müssen. Um Platz für all diese Gegenstände zu haben, kann man sich unterwegs einen Begleiter aufsammeln, der dann auch ausgerüstet werden kann. Ich habe bisher drei mögliche Begleiter gefunden: einen Piraten, einen Elfen und einen dunklen Ritter.

Zudem gibt es noch mehrere Bosse wie einen Riesenfrosch, einen Bohrer, eine Riesenspinne und dergleichen, die ich bisher noch nicht besiegen konnte, da sie sich immer in Phasen Helfer auf das Schlachtfeld holen und kurz bevor sie sterben regenerieren. 

Rundenbasiert sind nur die Kämpfe. Ansonsten läuft man in der Welt in Echtzeit herum. Bzw. man ist auch mit dem Schiff unterwegs und kann im Wasser ebenso Schätze aufsammeln und Kämpfe bestreiten (gegen Piraten). Zu manchen Gegenden muss man sich den Weg erst suchen. 

Alles in allem: ein tolles Spiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170957458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 999, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 781, 'last_played': 1427651958}
review:
I am having fun with this game!  Haven't played all the campaigns yet, focusing on beating the original one first.  This game does require some strategy and it's good to save often.  Each island is a bit of a challenge, but eventually enemies stop being marked as "lethal" or "invincible" and then it's just a matter of (saving first) jumping in to the fight.

Getting around is easy, graphics are good enough (imho), don't care about the story at all though I do find the Princess's dialogue to be trite and badly written.  Overall, enjoyable experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989248448', 'num_games_owned': 2871, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1525, 'last_played': 1422188659}
review:
*** 한국어 ***

RPG와 전략시뮬레이션의 조합.
HOMM시리즈와 더불어 재미있게 즐긴 게임.

아쉬운점이라면은 아머드 프린세스 본편에 추가적으로 생긴 캠페인에는 약간 실망감이 있었습니다.
크로스월드가 기존 아머드 프린세스에 유닛추가된거 외에는 별 다른점이 없다는게 아쉽습니다.

하지만 OST와 색다른 재미가 있기에 이 게임의 점수는  10점 만점에 8점입니다.

*** English ***

The combination of RPG and strategy simulation.
Fun and enjoy the game with HOMM series.

Unfortunately, if there was a little disappointed in addition to the King's Bounty : Armored Princess campaign has caused this title.

A King's Bounty : Crossworlds happened to add another point, except per unit on an existing King's Bounty : Armored Princess.

Because the OST and unusual but interesting point of this game is (8 / 10)

*** 日本語 ***

RPGと戦略シミュレーションの組み合わせ。
HOMMシリーズに加え、面白く楽しむゲーム。

残念な点であれば、はアーマードプリンセス本編に加えて生じたキャンペーンには少し失望感がありました。
クロスワールドが既存のアーマードプリンセスにユニットを追加起こった以外星他の点がないというのが残念です。

しかし、OSTと面白さがあるので、このゲームのスコアは10点満点で8点です。

author: {'steamid': '76561197965743021', 'num_games_owned': 432, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 2939, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1786, 'last_played': 1423071154}
review:
An excellent turn-based strategy. It's better and more clever than Heroes of Might and Magic. It's all combat though; no empire management type stuff. My only gripe is the limited number of a unit type available to buy. It makes it hard to recover from too many pyrrhic victories; you can't just go grind gold to buy more.

+ Everything
+ Enough random generation for several playthroughs
- No way to grind if it gets too hard (rare). You're just stuck.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072022026', 'num_games_owned': 592, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 3044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2424, 'last_played': 1580459216}
review:
这种类型的游戏，可以让我静静思考，不会变得浮躁、冲动，而是变得更加沉稳、理性！
我并不是非常擅长玩这种类型的游戏，曾经接触过，但是没有即时刷刷刷来得痛快，所以就扔一边去了；现在重新下来玩，感觉还是挺不错的，我玩的只是简单难度，尽我最大的能力去玩无损，主要是适当地思考下，还是很好的，如果一路割草，就没意思了；当然也不要强迫自己那么玩，不然游戏失去娱乐性了，主要是想好好了解下游戏，毕竟这游戏没多少教程，对于兵种搭配、魔法技能选择等等，还得靠自己去摸索。
如果买了这款游戏的话，就不要再买King‘s Bounty：Armord Princess，因为这个是最全面的了，既包含了原版的，又包含了DLC。
如果你喜欢战棋类的回合制策略游戏，那么这个值得一买，但最好是打折的时候！
-------------------------------------------------------------------
据说近期添加了中文！好顶赞！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198051751157', 'num_games_owned': 711, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2465, 'last_played': 1505934750}
review:
This game is a good kind of differnt when it comes to RPGS I have played in the past.  While you do have a main hero, they are more of a commander and overlook the battles that your hired mercenaries take part in.  If you buy this it comes with Kings Bounty: Armored Princess so you will not need to buy that one at all. Also the Orcs campaign is the Armored princess game with extra updates so there is no reason unless you are a die hard fan to ever play the original.

Pros

+Interesting turn based RPG with many different elements effecting battle
+4 different difficulties 
+Takes a while to learn but a long time to master
+The items are very interesting and have qwirks about them such as a morale rating or life which will make you change your items or fight to keep them working
+Vast land to run around
+Pet Dragon helps in battle and levels up with you
+Can choose from 9 baby dragons at the start which will change your starting tactics a lot
+Large variety of Mercenaries to choose from which all have items that boost their stats
+Large skill tree
+You can also take on a helper who assists with different things and can also hold extra items
+Mercenary attributes and abilities differ greatly between races/classes
+Bosses are fun and different/There are other Hero Battles that change your tactics a bit
+Replayability is pretty high considering you have 3 differnt classes and tons of items and mercs to choose from
+Sets for items as well as "Artefacts" which have bonus effects when worn together
+All the islands vary greatly in how they look and the feal about them
+Game comes with the original version and two other modes as well

Cons

-Money is only gained through combat or on the ground in small doses and if you lose to many units and can't battle you may get into a tight situation
-Lots of running around trying to find a max number of mercenaries for your pack
-Story line isn't very important
-Troops on certain islands can really range in difficulty making it hard to move about
-Mercenaries have limits and can run out eventually
-Training new mercs costs a ton of trophies which are gained from combat and you can easily run out
-Mercenaries are at different locations and are sometimes extremely hard to find 
-You don't earn a better way of travel until about half way through the game

author: {'steamid': '76561198134276481', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 3497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3458, 'last_played': 1417922756}
review:
(15.3.2015 - 加多了對遊戲的看法, 但評分部分維持不變)

花了58小時終於全破遊戲(以普通難度完成一次遊戲, 支線任務則完成大概90%左右)
以下是我對遊戲評分

[h1] 劇情: 5/10 [/h1]
雖然是一款角色扮演的戰略遊戲, 但是劇情的鋪展只能算是非常普通, 簡單來說, 就是魔王入侵, 主角去了異世界搬救兵救地球, 這種直線劇情很難有甚麼驚喜, 儘管異世界中不同的小島有不同的專屬劇情, 例如有亂臣奪國, 也有蜥蜴暴君高壓統治等小故事, 但因為各小島之間也少有明顯交集, 所以對主劇情的發展沒太多幫助, 劇情分數也難以給予高評價, 唯一不錯就是最後可遇上第一集的英雄, 算是系列劇情的一個小小精彩

[h1] 遊戲性: 8/10  [/h1]
Steam之中也有為數不少的這種小隊制的回合戰略遊劇,, 但這個系列我會給不錯評價, 第一點值得稱讚的是大量的兵種, 裝備及技能, 而且他們的設計也頗有特色, 舉例說, 海盜兵種的迴避, 帝國兵的高防, 蜥蜴兵的範圍攻擊, 裝備則有套裝, 或者附有自已靈魂的武器, 而技能也有小小的加速術到水龍卷等, 這種種的變化給予玩家極大的配兵自由, 再加上自由的主角天賦選擇(主戰士, 主防御, 或主法術), 玩法次次不同, 因此我給了8分

[h1]畫面/音樂/氣氛: 5/10[/h1]
這種畫面簡單的回合遊戲我本來就沒甚麼要求, 但本作的水平也不算低, 所以是完全合格的, 可惜的是音樂方面就很一般了, 基本上是到玩完也沒甚麼印象)

[h1] 重玩性: 4/10 [/h1]
雖然在國外論壇都禿很多外國玩家都有玩上好幾次, 但對本人來說, 重玩性不算高, 第一點是因為破一輪的時間要太多了, 第二就是基本上玩一輪已經可以玩到不同的兵種, 雖然要嘗試不同主角的主天賦需要開新進度, 但也不能吸引我再次去玩

這個系列有些玩家會說是抄襲魔法門系列(我也打算買第6代:D), 但我則認為則使兩者相似, 也不能沒殺這系列的可玩性, 而且這系列經常, 如果遇上特價, 而你又喜歡回合戰棋遊戲, 絕對值得買!

author: {'steamid': '76561198021756703', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 5043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5043, 'last_played': 1412820999}

author: {'steamid': '76561198140869674', 'num_games_owned': 1551, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 21156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5633, 'last_played': 1574892810}
review:
Not best Turn-Based strategy game and not best RPG game. It’s the definitive one of the best mixs of Turn-Based Hex grid battles with RPG elements.

Gameplay:
+ Semi-randomized world. - It's almost impossible that you meet all the spells, units and items in first try.
+ Replay value.
+ Seven different races. - Humans, Elves, Orcs, Undeads, Demons, Dwarves and the Lizardmen.
+ Literally tons of units. - Over 100 different units.
+ Over 60 different Spells. - Divided into three sections: Order, Distortion, and the Chaos.
+ A vast world to explore. - Include 14 different islands. 
+ Wide-range of quests.
+ Decent AI.
+/- Three playable classes. - the Warrior, the Paladin and the Mage. Each class has one specific skill and other skills selectable by other classes.

The atmosphere and graphics: 
+ Stunning fantasy world. 
+ Impressive textures quality.
+ Quite nice landscapes.
+ Beautiful 3D graphics.
+ Detailed Units, Objects, Levels and the Spells.
+ Good music and sound.

Performance:
+ Running pretty well and smooth on a mid-range PC.
+ Fast combat loading.
- Delay at launch time.

Additional:
+ Steam cloud.
+ Level editor.

review: 前些日子国王的恩赐打折，所以整个系列都入了。最近玩才发现交错世界貌似包含原版戎装公主，因为这两个游戏我都买了所以我不太确定是否真是这样，如果真是这样为什么还卖原版？而且更令我费解的是这两个价格还一样，求知情者做鉴定！

author: {'steamid': '76561198030786790', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 14304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4785, 'last_played': 1669388760}
review:
Similar to Heroes of Might and Magic, King's Bounty will keep you coming back if you are strategy fan. It does away with city building, and focuses on combat, hero building, and troop selection. Add a pet dragon that can turn the tide of battle, numerous artifacts you can find or buy, a varied pool of troops to select from, and a well thought out hero skill tree, King's Bounty Crossworlds is fantastic.

Highly recommended if you like fantasy strategy games that are challenging, and doubly recommended if you loved Heroes of Might and Magic.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966166767', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 4082, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1398, 'last_played': 1416350341}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999111257', 'num_games_owned': 784, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 5079, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4913, 'last_played': 1413296532}
review:
Kings bounty: Armored Princess я купил чуть ли не в день выхода и не был разачарован. Перед этим было наиграно немало часов в легенду о рыцаре, которая мне тоже очень понравилось. Хочется сказать, что сиквел получился гораздо лучше по всем параметрам. Появились наборы артефактов, была переработана система скиллов, добавлены новые отряды и раса и прочее, прочее(еще больше контента в расширении Crossworlds).
Данную стратегию-ролевку я советую попробовать всем, особенно любителям "Героев", ну и, конечно же, поклонникам той самой, оригинальной Kings Bounty. Игра наверняка затянет вас сюжетом, сражениями и разнообразными вариациями прокачки, обмундирования и составления отряда. И хотелось бы отметить, что принцесса получилась даже интересней, чем легенда о рыцаре, которая под конец все-таки начинала надоедать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050880400', 'num_games_owned': 346, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 6234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6037, 'last_played': 1441129290}
review: Great game which while being similar in some aspects to Might & Magic Heroes, it is overall quite different, I really like the variety of spells the game has.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961295487', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5030, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4389, 'last_played': 1677944314}
review:
First of all: Crossworlds = enhanced Armored Princess for PC gamers. The stand-alone Armored Princess is intended for Mac users, since there's no Crossworlds for Mac. 

Secondly: this is probably the best King's Bounty there is. It has all the good stuff - pleasurable grind, silly-but-fun storyline, plenty of different units and spells etc. without the negatives of the later games (i.e. game-breaking bugs, excessive back-and-forth-running, so-so balance). 

+ nice atmosphere
+ constant feeling of progress
+ plenty to do (50+ hours per playthrough easily)
+ holds its grip until the very end

+/- lots and lots of text, but it's skimmable and light-heartedly funny

Highly recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198099204539', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3403, 'last_played': 1410702866}

Claro, se vc comprou o king's bounty armored princess não compre esse, pois é a mesma coisa, esse é melhor pq tem mais itens e tropas, mais a campanha é a mesma. Jogo nota 11 de 10

With this one being the most hailed title in the series, I don't want to know how horrible the others are. I feel bad I actually paid for this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046428428', 'num_games_owned': 413, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 3377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1465, 'last_played': 1624633140}
review: классика жанра,триумф Российского игропрома,жедевр на века и просто апупенная стратегия!Я играл в эту серию игр с 9 лет и вот,спустя 5 лет пустил слезу купив её в Steam.Лучшая копия героев за всю историю.(Здесь в отличии от героев одна огромная карта и Огромная туча артефактов с возможностью комбинирования в очень мощные)гексовая сетка поля боя(чего так не хватает в новых героях)очень хорошие миссии с юмором.хорошо детализированное окружение.Апупенные боссы.Очень много магии + ветки развития персонажей.Интерактивные диалоги(правда без озвучки,хотя это придаёт ощущение олдскула).Очень много персонажей 2-го и 3-го плана.камни Теаны что дают дополнительные элементы геймплея.Красивые пещеры.Оруженосцы с которыми тоже связано много интересного.Здесь даже есть грёбаные ДРАКОНЫ.в общем маст хев и всё такое.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054018615', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1185, 'last_played': 1408442092}
review: 这是一个外表极像HoMM3，内核却完全不同的一个游戏。首先缺少资源的调度、城市的运营，乐趣上就少了一半，地图上所有的资源概括起来只有钱和等级两种，何况很多还可以靠偷。战斗方面，过小的战场加上领导力的限制导致复杂战术难以实施，以弱胜强几乎是不可能的。两相综合，就使KB系列变成了这么一个游戏：偷图，偷旗，偷钱，跑跑跑，最后达到滥强，碾压比自己弱得多的怪。诚然，机制上的某些创新使它玩起来倒不是完全没有乐趣，但是，怎么说呢，想玩英雄无敌，也就只有去玩英雄无敌了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198030566938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 640, 'last_played': 1408818655}
review: Great playing game.  Love the Story line!

author: {'steamid': '76561197998718279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 35506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11943, 'last_played': 1704419839}
review:
Wonderful itteration of classic mold TBSRPG, turn based stratagy role playing game.  The franchise predesessor of heroes of might and magic, has renewed itself again as a mix of real time world movement, and turn based grid combat. 

This series is a real gem for new and old alike, from those who are familiar with HOMM series to those who have never heard of it.  A word of caution though, it will get a bit tedious towards---or on the way to---the end of the game when you run into one of two problems.

1. everything is too easy and you have the 'perfect' army and tactical setup.
2. everything is too hard and you lose every fight, and now have no money.

However, the game provides an easy 40 hours of fun, for the price is a worthwhile investment, with high replayability, I'd imagine the developement of the game needs to tinker a bit with it to make it more balanced.  Have tested the game numerous times on all difficulties mainly with the Mage class.  there are 3 classes to play, each class sports a different playstyle and has a mind  boggling amount of customization from army composition, skills, and items, everything is also randomly generated to a point, that is to say within certani perameters.  

I'd recomend purchasing if you enjoy a good spot of fantasy and strategy battles, especially if on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023609330', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 4100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3895, 'last_played': 1371814002}
review:
So... 68 hours behind and I can say that it wasn't so cool such I had expected. I do believe that King's Bounty: The Legend is a truly masterpiece, but this game... looks like a big fan-project. I tried to finish all quests in the game to complete my final opinion. Yeah, it was so long and boring, I did it just because of my passiiom to The Legend... 
King's Bounty: The Legend is the best King's Bounty ever. The remaining part of this franchise is not so good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125904040', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 892, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 892, 'last_played': 1408783705}
review:
This game has a lot packed into one game... It has RPG elements, turn-based strategy-style combat, grinding gameplay, well-written story, etc etc.

If any of those things interest you then you should give the game a shot. Pick up "Crossworlds" because you'll end up receiving several games in one package with it.

8/10 buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021857629', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 525, 'last_played': 1325836800}
review:
パッケージ版　Kings Bounty The Legend  
パッケージ版とスチム　Kings Bounty Armored Princess 
スチム　King's Bounty　Crossworlds
プレイ順に上から。
SRPG（シュミレーションRPG）ターンベース形式の戦闘でプレイヤーのユニットを考え編成して、戦術を駆使してたくさんの様々なクエストにチャレンジしていく。
ファンタジー系の世界観が素敵でシュミレーションRPGが苦手だと思ってた本人もすんなりプレイできたゲームの１つ。
戦闘が始まるとユニットたちが配置されるのだけどこの感じがいい。ユニット数も豊富にいます
そして何より遊びやすいところが始めた頃の印象でよく覚えています。
このシリーズはたくさんでていますがその理由はプレイしてみて確かめて下さい
Dark sideが発売するということですがいいニュースであり楽しみ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198002921804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1404051237}
review:
Fairly Early on review. Posting simply in case somebody with the game on their wishlist sees it, before the summer sale ends. 

Odd concepts that so far do not equal a truly great game. Non Re-spawning enemies is a odd choice, when adding in the permadeath of your troops, being able to grind the new ones up to a suitable level feels like a needed feature. King's Bounty instead teaches you to take better care of them, and will have you re-loading after a hard fought battle, simply because you did not win it with acceptable losses. 

The story is interesting, but presented in text conversations that tend to go on and on....if you are like me, and reading is not something you tend to do in games, you may find yourself simply skipping everything and just following your quest marker. I am honestly not sure what is going on in my game, but the opening video and story seemed like a nice concept. Dimensional travel, in search of possible time travel....or maybe I didn't pay enough attention and have that wrong. 

Lots of different troops, each playing slightly different in battle. Fights are turn based, and take place on a hex board. Some boards will have obstacles in your path, and you and your enemy will also have the ability to spawn more if need be. Your hero does not actually fight however, but simply gives orders and casts magic. While that was certainly disappointing, it does not detract to much from it. Fights are tense, but do tend to take awhile once the enemy starts piling up large amounts of troops. 

The fights are made easier by the inclusion of a dragon you are given at the start of the game. You can summon it every other turn to do multiple things. Great damage, build walls, pick up treasure, give more magic, and more. Have a hard foe, or a enemy taking pot shots at you from long range? Just let the dragon kill them, no real strategy needed. While he does feel cheap, I did enjoy using him. 

This reminds me of a board game. You move your pieces around, and try to out think or out maneuver your opponent. I am only on the 3rd Island, but so far the AI does not seem to be the greatest. They tend to consider how each troop acts, but not how to use them with the other units in their army. Terrain also seems to confuse them, though it may only be due to how early in the game I am. Most of the challenge thus far has come from the large numbers or troops, instead of their tactics. They tend to just rush me with melee, and have the mages or archers stay back. 

Game looks very dated, almost reminds me of World of Warcraft when it first launched. It still looks decent though, and it is very vibrant and colorful. No real issues on that end, and I like the cartoonish look of everything. 

The game so far has been enjoyable, and there are cheat codes you could resort to if the permadeath becomes a issue. So I would say don't let that and not being able to grind keep you from trying it out. The price is decent, and I have easily gotten my moneys worth with as little as I have played so far. I would say the biggest enjoyment is trying out all the different troops and seeing what each one can do. Then trying to build a hero around supporting them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120878629', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1483, 'last_played': 1527022437}

author: {'steamid': '76561197985027348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 637, 'last_played': 1403466627}
review:
I am very surprised by how fun this game is.  I've had this game in my library for quite a while, and finally found some time to give it a go, and what I found is a very deap, challenging, and almost limitless game.  At the time of my writing this I believe I have about 10 hours of play time.

Pros:
-I love getting destroyed when I go to locations I should be
-Lots of varied mission objectives
-Feels like a ton of customization features when it comes to your troops and your skills

Cons:
-Biggest complaint is just the amount of text, be prepared to do a lot of reading if you want to follow the story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011604006', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 13637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13637, 'last_played': 1315033200}
review: Absolutely awesome game. The Kings Bounty series remains one of my favorites of all time, and one of the only series I'll actually replay through several times. It's an exploration game where you lead armies around the world, picking up relics and leveling up your character. It plays similarly to games like Heroes of Might and Magic, but the major difference (and the reason I like this series better), is you are encouraged and rewarded for exploring. There is no turn counter while you explore the map, putting you in a race against other towns or enemies. Explore as much as you want and roam everywhere without fear that your enemy is building up their army while you have fun. If you run into an area where the enemy is too strong for you, just explore somewhere else and come back once you gain some levels and spells.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043811791', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 719, 'last_played': 1388779440}
review: Nice turn-based strategy with some cool quests. The storyline is simple, yet entertaining, but the real gem is the combat system with a nice variety of creatures and a nice role-playing system. Highly recommend for all fans of Heroes of Might and Magic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057372331', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1400974190}
review: I was looking forward to this game since I enjoy most turn-based combat games. I have never been so disappointed in a game. It's nearly impossible to advance past a certain point without repeatedly dying. There are no opportunities for grinidng, so if you come up against an enemy you can't handle and you've already killed all the easy ones: you're screwed. The combat is repetitive and unrewarding. Having to dispatch groups of 100+ minions is boring to the point of tears. Spend your money elsewhere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030795982', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1887, 'last_played': 1624020903}
review: Repetitive, silly, grindy.  Love it.  Where else can you mix and match knights, archers, plants, wolves, spiders, dragons, snakes, undead, orcs, and robots?  The difficult part is that you can never clear a new area when you first arrive; there is always a stack or ten that completely outclass you;  once you have gone to a new area, gotten more and better troops and spells, you come back and kick those "invincible" dudes easily.  Huge world.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028548485', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1809, 'last_played': 1434670755}
review:
(Mostly posting this for badge progress)
I don't recommend this game because it simply lacks balance. When, even on the easiest difficulty, the recommended strategy is "run around collecting things and avoiding enemies until the random pickups make you strong enough to survive," there's a huge problem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047229906', 'num_games_owned': 745, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2156, 'last_played': 1429048081}
review: Just as solid as the other Kings Bounty games but with a new race (the Orcs) that keeps it fresh, they're tricky enough to keep you on your toes but not different enough to change the game in any dramatic way. Essentially more of the same, and that is not a bad thing at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969960651', 'num_games_owned': 447, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 9507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9322, 'last_played': 1396050153}
review:
King’s Bounty: Crossworlds is a fantastic game which features aspects of RPG & Turn-Based Strategy. It offers you the main campaign (Orcs on the March: Expansion for Armored Princess with additional content) and 2 other smaller campaigns (Champion of the Arena: Boss Battles in Gladiatorial Combat & Defender of the Crown: Battles in Unique Arenas). It is suppose to be similar to the HOMM & Fallen Enchantress, but it feels more enjoyable with the main campaign lasting between 40-60 hours. You get to choose between 3 starting classes (Warrior, Paladin, Mage), each with a special ability (skill) and with crossoworlds, you receive an additional skill, which varies depending on your class. You also get a pet dragon, which can "cast" special dragon abilities, which are really cool!! Overall the game is worth playing and I would recommend it!!

Pros: 
Beautiful Music
Spells & Pet Dragon
Randomized "Worlds" (No 2 playthroughs are the same)
Good Story
Lots of different types of units to use, ranging from humans, to undead to dragons…

Cons: 
Learning curve is a bit high (but once you figure out the game, it is really easy)
The first 4 islands can be hard for a new player

author: {'steamid': '76561198032238571', 'num_games_owned': 735, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 6481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6431, 'last_played': 1395625387}
review:
As a serious strategy gamer - I really enjoy this game, alot. But there's a serious flaw: it's too easy unless it's on the hardest mode, but then it becomes unwinnable unless you use -one- tactic as a specific point in the game. So, once you get to snowy island with the machines and nords, get engineers, robots, and split your healer-bots into two groups. Make them heal each other. 

Now you've gotten through the unbalanced part of the game. Stop using that strategy if you want it to be at all challenging/fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020239888', 'num_games_owned': 514, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1334905200}
review: Шикарно. Классика.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006004577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 731, 'last_played': 1661293138}
review: Like Heroes of Might and Magic? Want to just control a hero and not worry about that pesky city building, or enemies taking them from you? Want to go on an epic adventure with an army and combat like in the HoMM games? This game is what you should buy, then! It's the HoMM experience without city building, but more features in other areas, where you go around hiring allies for your army, to engage in combat in that exciting HoMM way!

author: {'steamid': '76561198063338061', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 873, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 873, 'last_played': 1391083102}
review: best game in the series of King's Bounty; buy this if you want to try the games out, or Vanilla Legends is also a nice starting point.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969693940', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 895, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 895, 'last_played': 1391532422}
review:
It is worth noting that this format of game is older than the similar Heros of Might and Magic series.  The game mechanic is similar however, you're are controlling only one "Hero".  I guess you could consider this a sub-set of "HOMM".  Basically this version is the best of the Kings Bounty series.
It's a good looking game and although a bit repetative (aren't all RPG's), the combat still remains oddly interesting no matter how many times you do it...
It's about the best combo of Strategy and RPG around (this includes HOMM also)...  Although I have not technically reviewed it; it's a bit like the matrix...  You have to see it for yourself...

author: {'steamid': '76561198032788858', 'num_games_owned': 1105, 'num_reviews': 678, 'playtime_forever': 1257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1257, 'last_played': 1390767037}
review:
Неплохое дополнение к дополнению.

Доступны нам три кампании (одна за мужика - Артура, две других за хрупкую Амели). Кампания Артура интересна тем, что это арена. В прямом смысле, бой за боем, мы прорываемся на свет божий из заточения. Одна из кампаний Амели - Поход орков, суть, переработка оригинальной "Принцессы в доспехах", только с новыми плюшками и зверюшками. Через некоторое время, пройти обновленную кампанию, самое то, на мой взгляд. Обидно, что действительно нового здесь не столь много, как можно ожидать от игр, за подобную цену. Не доложили, так сказать.

Обними орка! 7 из 10 :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198049267390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1441146883}
review: Неоднозначное продолжение лучшей РУ стратегии за последние лет 12 (Crossworlds это и есть допиленная Принцесса в Доспехах). Нет, все на месте, классы допилены, все дела. Вот только.... ничего нового, вообще. Главная же проблема - Главная Героиня, она конечно няша и все дела, но играть за едва ли выросшую принцессу, плавать на уже порядком заебавшем пиратском архипелаге, и собирать "карманных" юношей-оруженосцев - то еще удовольствие. И старых Духов заменяет некии дракончеги (на самом деле клоны Стича из одноименного мультфильма, грустно, художник не постарался), которые друг от друга оличаются едва ли. Конкретно в Crossworlds можно побаловаться доп. кампаниями - ничего особеннного, та же мура.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996618431', 'num_games_owned': 2910, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 7313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6427, 'last_played': 1390134654}
review: Grandissima espansione di King's Bounty: Armored Princess, aggiunge tantissime nuove quest, nuovi oggetti, nuovi incantesimi, un nuovo sistema legato all'adrenalina e tanto altro. Il gioco è davvero bello e diventa difficile riuscire a smettere di giocarci.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072298448', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 4336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4336, 'last_played': 1389640555}
review:
King's Bounty: Crossworlds（KB：Cw）はシミュレーションRPG

・ゲーム内容
基本はクォータービューでフィールドを探索する中世ファンタジーRPG
戦闘時のみターン制のヘックス移動型で、この部分が日本のSRPGに近い

このジャンルに求められる部分は全体的に良く出来ていると評判
ただ、国産のSRPGに近いものを求めている場合はちょっと違うかも

・日本のSRPGとの違い
日本のSRPGで有名なFEやオウガシリーズと比較すると、
KBのほうが資源管理ゲーの要素が強い。それとユニットの個性が薄い

例えばFEだと、被ダメがいくつでもユニットが死にさえしなければok
いっぽうでKBだとユニットのHPは兵数（有限）で決まるため
HP単位で損害を抑える必要がある
ただ難易度Normalなら余裕があるのであまり気にしなくていいかも

個性については、例えばFEならナバールという個人が仲間だけど、
KBで仲間になるのは剣士という兵種ユニット
剣士は成長しないし、固有のストーリーもない
（ただ雇用上限数が増えるためその分強くはなる）

・KBの他のシリーズとの関係
1作目がLegend、独立した2作目にArmored Princess（AP）、
APに追加要素（キャンペーン）を足したものがこのCrossworld(Cw)
LegendをやらずにいきなりCwからやっても全く問題なし

・日本語について（修正　2017年3月）
Legend、APには公式に日本語が付いた。
Cwには日本語化MODがある模様

・その他
個人的にも寝る間を惜しんでやる位とてもハマった

理由は、難易度次第なのだろうけど、まず、探索で手に入る
お宝がゴミばかりでもなく、常に上位互換品と交換するのでもなく、
絶妙で探索自体が楽しい。
また、手に入る品も単純にステータスだけみて↑というよりは、
目的に沿って装備の組み合わせを考える感じなのもよかった。

次に、兵種の組み合わせもたくさんの種類の中から自分なりの兵団を
作ることになるので、構築し甲斐がある。しかも実際の戦闘で
特色がもろに出るため、戦略的な意味でも面白味があった。

author: {'steamid': '76561198016815299', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3060, 'last_played': 1355299200}
review: King's bounty plays a lot like Heroes of Might and Magic, whenever you have an encounter on the overworld you have stacked units on a hex board with turn based combat. You get a dragon that can cast a spell per turn (increased turn cooldown depending which spell you choose) and your hero character (the armored princess) can cast a spell per turn. Your hero character equips armor and weapons that change your hero's stats. The hero isn't involved in combat other than spells but your stats are attributed to your units in combat. Overall King's bounty is one of my favorite games and it is oddly addicting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006702778', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1696, 'last_played': 1416756476}
review: Starting out I thought this game was made for the little ones.  Boy was I wrong, this game is epic.  One of my favorite strategies I have played to date, endless options, so much to see and do.  Definitely worth the price.  I love that I can customize my army with any creatures I would like, any scoll I get I can add to my spell book.  Can be as challenging or as easy as you make it.  And having a flying horse doesn't hurt either.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092675769', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1387129878}
review: Возможно я чего-то не понимаю, но как "Перекрёстки миров" вдруг стали полноценным аддоном? По мне, это скорее миссии, которые разработчики забыли добавить в "Принцессу" и сейчас исправили эту оплошность, сменив для своего оправдания главного героя в одной из частей "полноценного аддона". И, к сожалению, как-то не сильно это всё меняет дело. Хотя пару лишних часов к любимой игре добавит. Собственно, за маленькую работу - маленькое спасибо.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043089288', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3765, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3765, 'last_played': 1323244800}
review: Wer Heroes of M&M mag, wird hier Stunden verbringen ohne auf die Zeit zu schauen. Der Urfahrter kehrt in neuem Gewand zurück und weiß auf Anhieb zu gefallen. Schade, dass der Text nicht gesprochen wird, aber für Fans des Genres ist dieses Game ein Muss.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018829111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 5811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5346, 'last_played': 1383854920}
review: Probably the best turn-based strategy game ever made. It easily wins from any of the games of the Heroes of Might and Magic series (yes, even the 4th one!!), because it has much more depth to the strategy in the game. Units have diferent abilities, each class has diferent builds for their masteries and you have many more skills to choose from during the fight, and outside of it. There is also the rage system and the pet dragon, which are both very awesome ideas that improve even more your gameplay. Its definitely worth buying, so spread it to your friends! =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198054357894', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 3765, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3765, 'last_played': 1386649228}
review:
score: 8/10
世界観はコテコテのファンタジーで戦闘は兵隊ユニットを使用してのターン性ストラテジー。
Risen2のように船でいくつかある島を移動し、上陸後は馬に乗って探索します。中盤以降は馬に翼が生えてかなり自由に移動できるようになります。
ユニットの種類が非常に豊富でそれらが盤上で生き生きと戦う様は見ているだけでも楽しい。
クロスワールドを購入された方は最初から拡張版をプレイされることをオススメします。オリジナルモードとストーリーが同じでユニットやアイテム、スキルなどが多数追加されています。
当方最初にオリジナルモードでプレイしてしまい、クリア後になってメニューの一番下が拡張版と知って流石に２週目やる気が起きずに断念した経緯があるので・・・

author: {'steamid': '76561198051908351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 436, 'last_played': 1381471595}
review:
Warning: This game is one of the biggest time sinks in the planet.

Kings bounty is what Heros of Might and Magic originated from.
Same gameplay, but instead of versing others, it is a game bade on improving one hero. Fantastic fun, although the female deigns are overtly oversexualised.
Would recommend CrossWorlds over Armoured Princess, as this version contains AP. (Which I do not know why you would play since CW is literally the same story line with more content.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198038978650', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 5888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3902, 'last_played': 1418749833}
review:
This game has beautiful visuals even for today's standard, real awesome musical soundtracks unlike the "generic epic crap" nowdays. Deep gameplay, highly customizable character, and a lot of strategies are involved. This game also has high replay value because items and troops are randomly generated each time you create a new game. Also the conversations are hilarious.

 Did I mention that the music is freaking poetry?

The King's Bounty series is trully a stunning work of art, a hidden gem lost in time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008074449', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 561, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1380982969}
review: Масштабное дополнение для King's Bounty: Armored Princess. К оригинальной кампании добавится глобальный квест "Поход орков", который расскажет о Рыжей Хапуге, которая, жаждет неограниченной власти и отправляется с армией сторонников на поиски древней бессмертной силы. Тотальный армегеддец оказался неминуем, и вожди орков обращаются за помощью к людям (читай - к Амели). Так же добавляются две отдельные кампании "Чемпион Арены" и "Защитник Короны". В первой играем за наемника, который попал в некий Колизей, дальше уже понятно развитие сюжета... Во второй кампании Амели проходит "проверку на прочность", будто тотальной резни с Баалом ей было мало, ага. Короткая, но напряженная кампания довольно. Так же доп нам предлагает несколько новых существ, гору новых артефактов и заклинаний, новые скиллы для существ, и несколько новых навыков для различных классов героя. Всё остальное осталось прежним, без изменений. Совет: если у вас есть Armored Princess и Crossworlds, и вы не играли ни в одну из них, то начинайте с "Перекрестков Миров", так как туда ВХОДИТ оригинальная кампания из "Принцессы в доспехах". Да и заново потом не придется перепроходить для завершения "Похода орков". Хотя, такую шикарную игру можно и перепройти ради такого, не будет в напряг.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027944021', 'num_games_owned': 549, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 2567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1424520028}

review: Crossworlds/Armored Princess (same game, Crossworlds adds 5% new content this is mostly OP and not well thought out) is even better than the original King's Bounty. Bigger, better, more of everything, better class skills, Paladin class isn't worthless anymore, the Dragon pet is adorable, the list goes on. Basically a near-perfect tactical combat strategy game, and don't forget: Impossible difficulty is the only true way to play any King's Bounty game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009392905', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1228, 'last_played': 1559082567}
review: I really enjoy the King's Bounty style of gameplay. It's a delicious blend of RPG and Strategy. It's also a constant struggle, as you try to conquer the map as efficiently as you can--while leveling up skills, equipping useful gear, acquiring magic and managing your choice of units. The gameplay and quests are repetitive to be sure, but it's still so darn addictive. To top it off, the game is also chock full of content, so much so that I'm not sure I'll ever complete it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992886766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 1877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1836, 'last_played': 1447128083}
review:
If you're gonna get one of the King's Bounty games then this is the one you want!

Awesome fusion of turn-based hexagon grid battles and RPG exploration, questing, level up, and choosing talents! 

The story isn't anything to write home about but there are many locations to see and explore - you can even sail around in a boat and eventually get a flying horse that'll REALLY speed up your trek across many islands and contenients!

There are literally 100+ different unit types to choose from, tons of gear to find and equip to suit your build, and TONS of spells! to find and inscribe into your spellbook! If you love Heroes of Might and Magic, Disciples and other games like those then this is a MUST HAVE!

author: {'steamid': '76561198023764766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 3327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2899, 'last_played': 1439694972}
review: This game came before Hereo's of Might & Magic, and these latest releases, KIng's Bounty The Legend, and the Stand Alone expansions Armored Princess + Crossworlds, reclaim the throne to rule as the best turn based fantasy game.  It's a perfect merge of Diablo-esque and Heroe's play, and strips out the tiresome map domination game play of Heroes, and focuses on the fun elements, such as the role-playing and the actual battles.  Don't let the the cheaper price fool you, this game is still a heavy hitter.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998827138', 'num_games_owned': 1209, 'num_reviews': 422, 'playtime_forever': 4387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3809, 'last_played': 1381582377}
review: King's Bounty: Armored Princess has vivid colorful graphics, tactical combat with simple mechanics but high variety, and a long and entertaining campaign. This expansion adds more variety in the form of new units and abilities, some extensions to the original campaign and two new, smaller, campaigns. Easily worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993438122', 'num_games_owned': 1167, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 13211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6430, 'last_played': 1705293430}
review:
Basically a large add-on to Armored Princess with a couple short campaigns thrown in. Overall a very enjoyable package and since it includes Armored Princess I would definitely recommend purchasing Crossworlds instead of Armored Princess. Of course I love this series and so I have purchased King's Bounty: The Legend here on Steam AND on Good Old Games (shout out to the great gog.com) AND Armored Princess AND Crossworlds. It is just a shame they don't have Crossworlds on gog.com b/c I would buy another copy.
If you love strategy games then buy this, you will love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022185938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 628, 'last_played': 1382259320}
review:
Для меня именно эта игра эталон жанра походовых ролевых стратегий - даже лучше героев и дисайплов.
Прошел все части.
В отличии от героев и дисайплов - у вас только один герой, нет развития замка и прочего микроменеджмента. Но зато уж Вашего героя и армию вы развиваете в любом направлении - хоть армии нежити с героем-бойцом, хоть смесь гномы+люди+драконы под руководством мага.

При выпуске игры в стиме - не было русского языка, но сейчас он уже добавлен, поэтому всем рекомендую игру к приобретению и вдумчивому прохождению!

author: {'steamid': '76561198001533034', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4608, 'last_played': 1333177200}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970252971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1745, 'last_played': 1605307373}
review:
V dnešních dnech, kdy série HoMaM a Disciples stojej za prd a jiný nemáme, je King´s Bounty jasnou volbou. Jedná se o remake velmi staré (starší než HoMaM) hry stejného jména. 

Narozdíl třeba od zmiňovaného HoMaMu, zde máte jen jednoho heráka, krásnou princeznu Amélii, se kterou jezdíte po mapě v reálném čase (žádné tahy jako v HoMaM). Nemáte žádný hrad, jednotky si kupujete u obchodníků na mapě a když v obchodě dojdou, tak máte smůlu :-) Velikost vaší pěti člené armády určuje tzv. "leadership," který získáváte při každém levelu a sbíráním věcí na mapě. Boj pak probíhá tradičně na tahy jako v HoMaM. Navíc ještě na začátku hry dostanete speciálního pomocníka ve formě roztomilého dráčka (ne jako v KB:Legends až po několika hodinách hry), který vám pomáhá svými kouzly a útoky a za bitvy stejně jako váš herák dostává zkušenosti a další schopnosti.
Na začátku si můžete vybrat ze tří povolání: válečník (orientace na boj a draka), kouzelníka (orientace na kouzla) a paladina (zhruba mezi dvěma předchozími). 

Na Steamu má KB demo, tak sami neváhejte zkusit, to vám o hře řekne asi nejvíc. 

Jen pro upřesnění:
Crossworlds je datadisk pro Armored Princess a jedná se de facto o hru Armored Princess (stejná kampaň s příběhem) s několika vylepšeními (nové questy, jednotky orků s adrenalinem, nové mini kampaně), takže je lepší koupit rovnou Crossworlds, protože to je prostě vylepšená Armored Princess.

Za sebe můžu KB:Crossworlds jedině doporučit, je to velmi dobře udělaná tahovka s velmi dlouhou hrací dobou. Jediný nešvar bych snad vyděl jen v tom, že je to téměř to samé (byť s mnoha a mnoha vylepšeními) jako předchozí KB:Legends (který pro pochopení příbehu hrát ani nemusíte), což na šodu být ani nemusí, pokud vás původní KB:Legends bavilo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970635981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 9569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9569, 'last_played': 1325318400}
review: Fun TBS RPG

author: {'steamid': '76561197993327232', 'num_games_owned': 382, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 7268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7268, 'last_played': 1345618800}
review:
A spiritual sequel to the old King's Bounty game, these are massive strategy games with character progression and a good deal of customization. The game is pretty solidly balanced, and many different strategies will work. I got 85 hours out of King's Bounty: The Legend just going through the game once, and I have 93 hours in Armored Princess/Crossworlds. An important thing to note is that the Crossworlds expansion has an updated version of the Armored Princess campaign, so unless you want to play it twice you should probably do the Crossworlds version of it. I think both games in the series are worth playing.

Only play on Hard if you are prepared for an actual challenge, because King's Bounty does not fuck around. The Warrior class seems a little less viable on Hard than the others, but I still beat the game on Hard with a Warrior. You are likely to be required to change up your strategy at least partially depending on what resources you have at hand.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010577733', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 993, 'last_played': 1322035200}
review:
While I enjoyed the King's Bounty games, this 'expansion' is a little misleading.  First of all, there is no real new campaign, but rather an alteration of the existing Armoured Princess campaign to add in some new variables, which does NOT update an existing AP game, meaning the only way to see this new content is to start a new campaign, which is bullshit.

The other 'campaigns' can't really be called campaigns, but rather a couple of hours of gameplay (at most) additions that are 1 dimensional meh-fests.

Avoid this unless the price drops below $5, as anything more is a complete rip-off.  Even at $5, this still feels like you got taken.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044619825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 6079, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6079, 'last_played': 1380312312}
review: Just as awesome as the King's Bounty games with a few extra features! A must for turn based strategy fans, and just gamers in general.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022232386', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1334559600}
review:
Where once there was Homm, now there is KB:C.
Real time exploration grants fast "no wait" gameplay and trun based battle lets you enjoy the tactical combat we all loved in Homm.

I did miss the building and rescource management part of game a bit but didnt notice it on my first playthrough :)

All in all this has been one of the best gaming experiences in long while.
9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197994130089', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2581, 'last_played': 1344841200}
review: If you enjoyed playing stuff like Heroes of Might and Magic, then the King's Bounty games are for you.    Has a good story, that keeps moving along as well as several hours of side quests you are able to do also.  Seriously, the best $2.50 i have spent in a long time.  Think it is around $10-$15 now because the sale is over, but i would of been just as happy paying $15 for it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032339954', 'num_games_owned': 524, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 5614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5614, 'last_played': 1307430000}
review:
Crossworlds ek paketi aslında Armored Princess’in ek paketi oluyor.Ana senaryoya birtakım yeni birimler,görevler ve itemlar ekliyor.Ayrıca 2 yeni campaing mevcut.Eğer Cs elinizde varsa Orc senaryosundan başlamanızı öneririm.
 
 İlk oyunda kurtardığımız küçük prensesimiz büyümüş ve dünyasını savunmak için kılıç kuşanmıştır.Tehdit o kadar büyüktür ki kendini başka dünyalardan medet ummak zorunda kalır.İlk oyunu bitirenler hala Endoria dünyasıyla ilgili bir şeyler beklemiyorlardı değil mi? Çünkü gerçekten yapacak bir şey kalmamıştı ve bunu bilen yapımcı firma bizi bu sefer Teana gezegenine atıyor.Teana, Endoria ile hemen hemen aynı bir dünya.Harita olarak adalara ayrılmış durumda.Bu biraz sıksa da zamanla aşılıyorsunuz.Ama ben yine de büyük Endoria topraklarını daha çok sevmiştim.Teana da elbette büyük bir gezegen ama topraklar genelde ufak adalardan oluştuğundan yer darlığı çekiyormuşsunuz gibi geldi.

 Öncelikle diyaloglarda bir eksiklik olduğunu ve görevlerin eskisi gibi ihtişamlı anlatılmadığını fark edeceksiniz.İlk oyunun en iyi yanlarından biri muhteşem diyaloglardı.Crossworlds de diyaloglar biraz baştan savma gibi olmuş.Görevlerde aynı paralelde gittiği için eskisi gibi zevk alamayacaksınız.Yeni eklenen birimler dengeyi bozmamış.Birimlerin 2 hatta 3. cül yetenekleri sayesinde taktik ve strateji ciddi bir şekilde değişmiş.Oyunun en güzel yanlarından biride bu.Birimlerinizin yeni yetenekleri savaşın gidişatını değiştirebiliyor.Savaş demişken ben hard da oynadığım için belli bir yere kadar epey zorlandım.Çünkü artık lvl atladıkça sadece liderlik puanınız artıyor.Artık saldırı veya defans puanları artmadığı için başlarda epey zorluk çekiyorsunuz.Bunları ancak yetenek ağacından veya ortalıkta çok az bulunan yerlerde arttırabiliyorsunuz.İlk 15 saat inanılmaz zorluk çektim bu yüzden.Sonrasında ise zorluk bıçakla öyle bir kesildi ki neredeyse bütün savaşları kayıp vermeden kazandım.Olay bu duruma gelince de sıkılmamak mümkün değil.Kısaca oyunun dengesini hiç ayarlayamamışlar.E buda belli bir zamandan sonra anlamsızca koşturacağınız anlamına geliyor.Bu açıkları kapamak için oyuna başarı sistemi koymuşlar(achievement).Mesela 50 savaşı kayıpsız atlatırsanız 1000 liderlik puanı alıyorsunuz.Bu gibi özellikler oyuna renk katmış.

 King’s Bounty dünyasının en önemli özelliği birimlerim ve itemlerın rastgele çıkmasıdır.Ama şansınız yaver gitmese ya oyun çok zor kalıyor ya da çok kolaylaşıyor.İlk oyunda böyle değildi.Denge neredeyse hiç bozulmamıştı.Ama Crossworlds de maalesef denge diye bir şey kalmamış.Bu rastgele birim olayını birazda olsa birimlerinizi upgrade etme özelliği sayesinde hafiflemiş.Şöyle ki 6 guardsmen’ı 1 knight a çevirebiliyorsunuz artık.Bütün büyük kıtalarda bir tane upgrade yeri mevcut.Böylece birim sıkıntısı pek çekmiyorsunuz.Item olayıda rastgele olduğu için set itemlerı tamamlamak imkansız bir hal alıyor.Boşuna kasmamanızı öneririm.Birde oyunun bazı bölgeleri hatalı tasarlanmış olacak ki masaüstüne atıyor.Autosave birçok şeyi kurtarsada Montero madenlerinde dolaşırken her savaştan sonra save etmenizde yarar var.

 Belki de yaptığım en kısa inceleme bu oluyor ama okumak ve anlamak için bu kadarı yeter kanımca.King’s Bounty Collection, Steam de 6 dolara bile düştüğü oluyor.Eğer alacaksınız ordan almanızı öneririm.Benim toplam 100 saatim gitmiştir oyuna.Epey vaktinizi alacağı kesin.İlk oyunu oynayanlar hayal kırıklığı yaşasa da bu oyuna bence şans vermeliler.Ama normal de oynamanız tavsiyemdir.

 Genel Not:80

author: {'steamid': '76561197967992446', 'num_games_owned': 1178, 'num_reviews': 543, 'playtime_forever': 3348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3348, 'last_played': 1361347200}
review: I don't know why it took me so long to get around to playing this. This is because the original King's Bounty was such a fascinating strategy sperger timesink that was pretty decent. However, if you HAVE to get one King's Bounty game, I wholly recommend Crossworlds, as it includes a much improved version of Armored Princess (the unofficial, much improved sequel) as well as several smaller campaigns that don't eat up much of your time but I assume are just as good. These are difficult games, but not on the level of Fate of the World or Bit.Trip Runner. Also you can send in an entire army of spiders to eat humans alive, I guess.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996147456', 'num_games_owned': 566, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 3395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2121, 'last_played': 1515724338}
review: If you have an addictive personality and want to be a paladin with an army of undead, then this is the game for you! One can not simply comprehend how addicting this game is, with each battle and unit lost or gained, what you are capable of doing in-game shifts. Press your luck in highly hostile areas for amazing rewards, or derp around in weak zones building the perfect army, it's all up to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970327632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3014, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3014, 'last_played': 86400}
review:
Crossworlds is an expansion for King's Bounty: Armored Princess. What Crossworlds does is basically to take the same campaign from the main program and adds all kinds of new troups, enemies (it also introduces new mini-campaigns that I haven't tried yet)... I never played the original campaign of Armored Princess, therefore I started with Crossworlds right away, because I wouldn't play the basically same campaign twice in such short intervals. 
The game itself is of a turn based strategy type during fights and real-time when simply moving through the game world. Said environment consists of several diverse islands (inhabited by pirates, orcs, barbarians, dwarfs...). All islands are filled with secrets, treasures, characters, quests, shops, enemies... Islands become available, once certain navigation charts were found. They are then accessible by boat. 
The story itself is rather genre-typical, but not bad at all, especially to fantasy fans. It also doesn't take itself too serious.
